message: I want to cash about 4000 object in client side ,  in a way that enable me to search in the fastest way..is there better way than saving them in js variable and looping..i think about localstorage but it seems to save string valus only which add one more step before searching..any suggestion or idea will be appreiated ..thanks

data.message:
Your problem has 2 sides:
1- storage/memory => 4k objects * (say) 1k = around 4 MB, which is not that big in web *application*
--> keeping the objects in memory is the *fastest* way!
if you still have problems in memory, you can use sqlite + sql.js
2- searching in objects => you can use any standard search algorithm, or use sql queries in case you will use sqlite
